attributes.action: Stop McDonald’s from being shut down in Dover,Kent.
attributes.additional_details: If McDonald’s in Dover town centre was to shut down , many teenagers wouldn’t have a place to sit and hangout meaning they would be in public places and parks for younger children causing disruption.
attributes.background: Many teenagers from local schools use McDonald’s as a hangout centre and many parents take their kids there when they are out as it’s an affordable and local restaurant.
